A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely loved this film\, i can almost see peoples criticisms but they're shadowed by how fresh this movie felt for being the 8th in the saga. I feel like this is the strongest standalone film in the bunch and it was wonderfully inventive with the groundwork laid for it. Had everything i could ask for\, it really brought back the crazy looking characters that littered the backgrounds of the original trilogy. I could've maybe asked for more scenes where rey felt like a real jedi student and not so beyond teaching but i also respect that direction because of how nuanced every other aspect of this movie was.
